aoop.asteroids.controller

Class JoinerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • aoop.asteroids.controller.JoinerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class JoinerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    JoinerController is the controller class that listens to the clients input (key events) and forwards those events to the server class. Where they will influence the state of the game model from the server's side.

      This method is invoked when a key is released and sets the corresponding boolean in the command to false.
